question: Chamba tunnel, which was seen in news recently, was inaugurated in which state/UT?
explanation:
Union Minister for Road Transport & Highways Nitin Gadkari recently inaugurated the Chamba Tunnel in Uttarakhand through video conference. The tunnel will be operationalised this October.
The tunnel has been constructed by the Border Roads Organisation (BRO) under Chardham Pariyojana scheme of Uttarakhand. It is a 12,000-crore project, to facilitate connectivity to Gangotri, Kedarnath, Yamunotri and Badrinath.  The 440-metre long tunnel has been created under Chamba town on Rishikesh-Dharasu road.
